content.query:
-- read without header files add headers according
select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        format='csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]

    -- specify columns in order wise
select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        format='csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        Zone varchar(50) 3,
        Borough varchar(15) 2
        
    )
    as [result]

    -- Fix column names in header file
select * from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        header_row=True,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        locationID smallint 1,
        borough varchar(15) 2,
        zone varchar(50) 3,
        service_zone varchar(15) 4
    )
    as [result]
